sentences.sContent: The lake is the largest spawning ground for red salmon in Eurasia and the best place for bears.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lake is the largest spawning ground for red salmon in Eurasia and the best place for bears.
sentences.sCn: 这个湖泊是欧亚大陆上最大的，红三文鱼的产卵场所。 也是野熊最爱呆的地方。

sentences.sContent: I first came to North American in prehistoric times when I crossed the Bering Strait land bridge from Eurasia.
sentences.sContent_eng: I first came to North American in prehistoric times when I crossed the Bering Strait land bridge from Eurasia.
sentences.sCn: 在史前时期，我从欧亚大陆穿越白令海峡、走过陆地、桥第一次来到了北美。

sentences.sContent: Three powers are emerging on the periphery of Eurasia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Three powers are emerging on the periphery of Eurasia.
sentences.sCn: 在欧亚大陆周缘地带将出现三大势力。
